给了p的低10bit，再给了抹去低20位的p之后的800位，copper直接打

```py
# sage10.6
from Crypto.Util.number import *
import gmpy2

n = 
c = 
gift1 = 513
gift2 = 5077110719426498428662246006638349628986894614097694065336047422264042823893900747327210766546701290926253205743419412459378571920759093322149140413682875156857171051511499793127787270654329155934268596972449238336868326196360992252498463385

for i in range(2**10):
    R.<x> = PolynomialRing(Zmod(n))
    f = x * 2^820 + (gift2 << 20) + (i * 1024 + gift1)
    res = f.monic().small_roots(X = 2^204,beta=0.3)
    if res != []:
        root = res[0]
        p = int(root*2^820 + (gift2 << 20) + (i * 1024 + gift1))
        qr = n // p
        tmp = gmpy2.iroot(qr,2)[0]
        r = gmpy2.next_prime(tmp)
        q = qr // r
        phi = (p-1)*(q-1)*(r-1)
        d = inverse(65537,phi)
        m = pow(c,d,n)
        print(long_to_bytes(int(m)))
        break
```
